name: Baldi's Basics Classic Remastered (Fanmade)
description:
I do not own baldi's basics all rights go to basically games

Support The Creator by getting the full game 

itch.io https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics-plus 

Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1275890/Baldis_Basics_Plus/

Gamejolt https://gamejolt.com/games/baldis-basics-plus/481026

or buying their merch

https://store.baldisbasics.com/

Play 3 Ways

Classic Style: The classic Baldi demo we all know and love

Party Style: The 1 year anniversary version of Baldi's Basics Classic

Demo Style: A demo of Baldi's Basics Plus so you can decide if you want to buy the full game or not
